about_the_game:
individualism in the dead-internet age: an anti-big tech asset flip shovelware r̶a̶n̶t̶ manifesto is a high definition anti-capitalism next-gen-ism, with good lighting, and optimized textures.

This is an interactive-essay-meets-walking-sim about technocapitalism and the things we lost along the way.
Follow coins under the electric mist of a clouded starry sky. Discover hyper-links. Listen to the words both inside and outside your head. Seal your fate before the productivity machine. Together we can defeat the machine.

Features include: Pedantic views on tech feudalism with nice shader work, and good reflection captures. Overly critical views on capitalism with lumen and nanite enabled.

Claim this game before it's gone forever.

These assets are next-gen. You will need a DirectX 11 capable gaming machine.

Some flipped assets, not all, allegedly from the following free-for-the-month bundles...

* Advanced Glass Pack (No assets were used)

* Bank Building (Many assets were used)

* Big Office (Many assets were used)

* Brutalist Architecture Office (Not enough assets were used)

* Clouds and Skies (No Assets were used)

* Advanced CRT TV - VCR - VHS Effects (Lazy use of these assets)

* 4 IN 1 Modular Research Facility / Mega Bundle (Trashcan assets were used)

content_descriptors.notes:
This game has a dark atmosphere.
Something feels "off".

name: individualism in the dead-internet age: an anti-big tech asset flip shovelware r̶a̶n̶t̶  manifesto

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Arc & Iris Xe Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 5900X 12-Core Processor
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics AMD Radeon RX 6900 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek Audio
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Follow coins under the electric mist of a clouded starry sky. Discover hyper-links. Listen to the words both inside and outside your head. Seal your fate before the productivity machine in this interactive-essay-meets-walking-sim about technocapitalism and the things we lost along the way.
